remarks.para: One may be inoperative closed provided there is no evidence of leakage.

placard.para: Placard near EICAS "SUMP DRAIN VALVE INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: See following illustrations for location and sketches of typical fuel sump drain valves.
Visually inspect exterior of valve location for evidence of fuel leakage.
